name: Discord Black Theme [V1.0.7]
description: Is the default Discord dark theme not dark enough for you? Then try this style! This style makes Discord even darker. Warning: This style will break if you have the Light Theme enabled in Discord. Turn off the Light Theme in Discord to use this style!

user.name: Lekrkoekj
user.about:
Hi I'm Lekrkoekj! 
I mostly make Dark Themes for a lot of sites on here. If you like any of my styles,  be sure to give feedback on them.

additional_info:
Version 1.0.7
Style updated for Discord's new domain.
Small improvements to the Friends screen.
The Create/Join server box is now fully dark and readable.
The Server Discovery search bar text is now more readable.
The Invite box is now fully dark.

Version 1.0.6 
The Phone top notification is now black.
Context menus are black again.

Version 1.0.5
The new Friends page is now dark.
The profile box in the bottom left is dark again.

Version 1.0.4
The homepage is now black.
The login screen is now black.

Version 1.0.3
The Recently played section is now black.
The GIF search bar is now black.
Selected tabs on profiles are black again.
The Member search box in the server settings is now black.
The Server creation box is now black.

Version 1.0.2
More stuff in the Guild Discovery is now black.
More sutff on the Activity screen is now black.
The New Unreads bar is now black.

Version 1.0.1 
The Custom Status box is now fully black.
Server context menus are now black
The new Server Boost screen is now black.
Warnings at the top of the screen are now black.

Version 1.0
Initial release.

discussions.name: Broken by new march UI update. fix please.
